actions.committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities. for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families

official_title: To amend the General Educations Provisions Act expanding the exemption for the release of student records to comply with certain State statutes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the General Education Provisions Act to revise the exemption from specified family educational and privacy rights for the release of student records to comply with certain State statutes.

titles.title: To amend the General Educations Provisions Act expanding the exemption for the release of student records to comply with certain State statutes.
